text: Chomo Yummo () is a mountain in the Himalayas on the border between Sikkim in India and Tibet in China. The term Chomo means "goddess" or "lady" in Tibetan. ==History== Chomo Yummo was first climbed in 1911 by the Scottish alpinist Alexander Kellas with the help of sherpas.http://publications.americanalpineclub.org/articles/12199727100/Asia- India-Sikkim-Himalaya-Northern-Sikkim-Various-Ascents ==See also== * Chomo Lhari * Chomo Lonzo * Chomolungma * Chomolhari Kang ==References== Category:Six-thousanders of the Himalayas Category:Mountains of Tibet Category:Mountains of Sikkim Category:North Sikkim district
title: Chomo Yummo
